org.xmlsoft

Class XPathContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xmlsoft.XPathContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable

    public class XPathContext
extends Object
implements Disposable
    The class represents a context of XPath which is associated with a document.
    Author:
    Jang-Ho Hwang, rath@xrath.com
